subtitle: Geoje Island and the Legacy of the Prisoner Camp

content.part1: In February 1951, the American army had to take charge of thousands of
content.subpart1: These were mainly Chinese and Korean soldiers.
content.part2: In the confusion of battle, any suspect allied with the North
content.subpart2: Geoje Island was chosen to host the main detention center. It would hold more than 150,000 prisoners.
